item.description:
@Darkmist wrote:

Hey guys, Iâ€™ve posted about one of these before but i cant seem to get it to work for this kind of thing im trying out, so Ill try explain as much as i can of what im trying to do

Basically Im trying to add items send out a clue of were a specific object is, It also spawns the object here my code

if(itemId == 2677) { c.getItems().addItem(14471, 1); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(75, 3620, 3543, 0, 10); c.sendMessage("[Hint] Im on a broken boat"); c.getItems().deleteItem(2677, 1); }

I need a random code for this part

I need it for that so i can add multiple locations and when its clicked it will randomly send 1 location

All help is well appreciated, thanks in advance
